syntax:
data bool = True | False
exclusive data xlist a = Cons { head: a; tail: xlist a} | Nil
abstract int
fact duplicable int

val id [a] (l: xlist int): () =
  match explain l with
  | Nil ->
      ()
  | Cons { head; tail } ->
      ()
  end
